This episode is 360p upon few begging/requests and I am mad because this episode turned to be almost 47 minutes (approx. 5 minutes longer than usual) and size of 196 MB is hardly acceptable. Plain small-sized 272p (I decided to add that in file-names, as clearer distinction) would be some 160 MB and such difference, even if sounds small, is a big one on my planet... Let say no-more-36op-Lost. OK with that?
